Texts: You turn off the flashlight. You don't see a thing anymore.
You turn on the flashlight. The beam lights up your surroundings.
It won't work without new batteries...
The light of the flashlight starts to dim.
The batteries in the flaslight are depleted. Slowly, it goes out.
You strike with your sword, but the monster dodges it.
You strike with your sword and you hit the monster hard.
The monster is badly injured and you're soaked in its blood.
You can strike again. Do you Want to? [y/n]
I didn't catch that. Please answer with y or n.
Je pockets are filled to the brim and you can't fit {item} in them.
You pick up {item} and puts it in one of your pockets.
You pick up {item} and puts it on.
You don't see a "{param}" that you can pick up.
It's pitch black and you can't see your hand in front of your face.
Around you, you see the smoldering remains of what used to be a forest.
Bathing in your own blood, you succumb to your injuries. While you're gasping for air on the ground, you hear loud laughter from a distance.
Then your eyes close and your heart stops beating.
At the same time, the bomb explodes and the earth dies with you.
